The claim was published on Facebook on F: 2020, and has been shared more than 20,000 times.
A similar claim was published on a Thai: language website, Baansuann, which translated to English as "Italy offers 800,000 THB to hire people to move to their country."
The claim is misleading because the fina: Italy, officially ended on November 30, 2019, as stated by the Italian government.
